attributes.action: Stop using Green-Stealth taxes towards the motorist or we will vote you out.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The motorist has had enough of over taxation and we want it to stop.

There are millions of us who use cars every day and are concerned about the environment but will not be fleeced by these so called "Green Taxes" which are just a stealthy way of gaining extra tax revenue.

If you, the Government, don't act now and reduce taxation on the motorist, introduce positive incentives to reduce car use - tax cuts - then we will not vote for you at the next election.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
